data.name: PGA TOUR 2K21 Callaway Club Drop Pack
data.detailed_description:
Looking to master the million-dollar swing? Equip your MyPLAYER with high-performance Callaway clubs, including drivers, hybrids and irons from the Mavrik Max collection. Tee it high and let it fly!

The PGA TOUR 2K21 Callaway Club Drop Pack includes:

- Callaway Mavrik Max Driver
- Callaway Mavrik Max Woods
- Callaway Mavrik Max Hybrids
- Callaway Mavrik Max Iron Set
- Callaway Jaws MD5 Black Wedges
- Callaway/Odyssey Triple Track Ten Putter
- Callaway Oversized Novelty Hat
- And More!

data.short_description: Master the million-dollar swing with high-performance Callaway. The PGA TOUR 2K21 Callaway Club Drop Pack includes: - Callaway Mavrik Max Driver - Callaway Mavrik Max Hybrids - Callaway Mavrik Max Iron Set - And More!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7x64 / Windows 8.1x64 / Windows 10x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-760 @ 2.80GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 5770 or NVIDIA GTX 650 with 1GB Video Ram
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7x64 / Windows 8.1x64 / Windows 10x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670 CPU @ 3.40GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7850 or NVIDIA GTX 660 with 2GB video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device
